_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The ascetic or brahmin that the Buddha s: More accomplished than myself in ethics
More accomplished than myself in immersion
More accomplished than myself in wisdom
More accomplished than myself in freedom
More accomplished than myself in the knowledge and vision of freedom
The spectrum of ethics, immersion, wisdo: Complete the entire spectrum of ethics
Complete the entire spectrum of immersion
Complete the entire spectrum of wisdom
Complete the entire spectrum of freedom
Complete the entire spectrum of the knowledge and vision of freedom
